description: This Java class defines a global exception handler for a Spring Boot application. It intercepts various exceptions such as resource not found, validation errors, illegal arguments, and generic exceptions, providing consistent and structured error responses in JSON format.

classes.name: GlobalExceptionHandler
classes.description: A Spring Boot REST controller advice class that handles exceptions globally, ensuring that API clients receive consistent error responses.

methods.name: baseBody
methods.description: Builds a standard response body for error responses including timestamp, status, error message, and additional data.

methods.name: handleNotFound
methods.description: Handles ResourceNotFoundException by returning a 404 response with an appropriate message.

methods.name: handleValidation
methods.description: Handles MethodArgumentNotValidException, returning a 400 response with validation failure details, including specific field errors.

methods.name: handleConstraint
methods.description: Handles ConstraintViolationException, returning a 400 response with validation violation details.

methods.name: handleIllegalArg
methods.description: Handles IllegalArgumentException, returning a 400 response with the exception message.

methods.name: handleGeneric
methods.description: Handles all other exceptions, returning a 500 response with a generic error message.
